
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex and called "ya"
# (https://github.com/yandex/yatool).
#
# Configuration files of ya build system usually named as ya.make. If ya.make file is presented
# at the  root of the repository, then this repository supports ya build. 
# 
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configuration, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build 
# system may be rejected.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)
add_executable(unittester-server-lib-io)


target_compile_options(unittester-server-lib-io PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)

target_link_libraries(unittester-server-lib-io PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  yt-yt-build
  server-lib-io
)

target_link_options(unittester-server-lib-io PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(unittester-server-lib-io PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/lib/io/unittests/erasure_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/lib/io/unittests/gentle_loader_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/lib/io/unittests/chunk_file_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/lib/io/unittests/io_engine_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/lib/io/unittests/io_tracker_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/lib/io/unittests/read_request_combiner_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/lib/io/unittests/io_request_slicer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/lib/io/unittests/io_workload_model_ut.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  unittester-server-lib-io
  COMMAND
  unittester-server-lib-io
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-server-lib-io
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-server-lib-io
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-server-lib-io
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)


target_allocator(unittester-server-lib-io
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-default
)

vcs_info(unittester-server-lib-io)
